headline: FIFA Global Citizen Education Fund Opens Grant Applications for Grassroots Organizations Worldwide
summary: HONG KONG, November 21, 2025--The FIFA Global Citizen Education Fund ("the Fund") is an important global initiative committed to expanding access to quality education and sports for children everywhere. Supported by MetLife Foundation, a founding donor, the Fund has opened for applications from nonprofit organizations focused on K-12 education. Applications for funding will be accepted through December 31, 2025.
